text: Aleksei Vasilyevich Petrenko (; 26 March 1938 – 22 February 2017) was a Soviet movie and stage actor.Скончался актер Алексей Петренко. tass.ru (23 February 2017) He was known for playing Grigori Rasputin in the Elem Klimov's historical drama Agony and Joseph Stalin in the BBC Two documentary World War II: Behind Closed Doors.''World War II: Behind Closed Doors''. Bbc.co.uk (10 November 2008).
